about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: python-lalburst
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.17.5
# ------------------------------------------------

package:

    version: 1.5.0

    url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalburst-1.5.0.tar.xz

    activate_in_script: true
    number: 1001
    string: py27h917ab60_1001
requirements:

        - swig 3.0.12 h0a44026_1003

        - lalburst 1.5.0 h53c389d_1001
        - lalmetaio 1.4.0 h53c389d_1001
        - lalsimulation 1.8.0 h53c389d_1001
        - libcxx 4.0.1 hcfea43d_1
        - libcxxabi 4.0.1 hcfea43d_1
        - libffi 3.2.1 h0a44026_1005
        - libgfortran 3.0.1 h93005f0_2

        - ligo-segments 1.0.1 py27h1de35cc_1000

        - lscsoft-glue 1.60.0 py27h1de35cc_0
        - metaio 8.5.1 ha441bb4_1000
        - ncurses 6.1 h0a44026_1002
        - numpy 1.9.3 py27_blas_openblash4251c03_1207
        - openblas 0.3.3 hdc02c5d_1001
        - openssl 1.0.2p h1de35cc_1001

        - pyopenssl 18.0.0 py27_0

about:
    description: 'The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

        This package contains the python bindings.'
    dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/

    home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/DASWG/LALSuite
    license: GPLv3
    license_family: GPL
    license_file: COPYING
    summary: LSC Algorithm Burst Library
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod
        - skymoo
